  1. Small business stationery for Sibylle Frank For Sibylle Frank I redesigned and implemented the website and designed a matching letterhead.

  3. Announcement: Silber & Blei Silber und Blei is the alloy of Anne and me for the manufacturing of valuable books. I introduce our undertaking here for the first time and show you the logo that I designed for attunement.

  4. The @inpressulum font and a typographic tattoo When Marc told me of his planned tattoo, he did not know which font to use. An unbearable state. I designed the gaelic font and the tattoo.
    Permalink Sunday, September 2, 2012 9:04:49 PM Europe/Berlin

    • Graphic Design
  5. Abraum Unterschichten der Kultur. The printed matter for an exhibition of the AG basement turn at the Institut für Europäische Ethnologie/Kulturwissenschaft of Philipps-Universität Marburg.

  7. Commemorative Stamp to the 200th Birthday of Hermann Schulze-Delitzsch. He was the orginator of the German co-operative system. During a university-project under Jay Rutherford we were invited to contribute at the design competition of this stamp.
    Permalink Friday, June 15, 2007 12:00:00 PM Europe/Berlin
